content:
In an Excel table, I have a column of negotiation techniques with their definitions. One of the techniques is 'give-and-take.' 
What is the meaning of 'give-and-take' according to the following Excel table?
| Technique | Definition |
| --- | --- |
| Give-and-take | Negotiating by compromising and making concessions in order to reach an agreement. |

In your Excel table, the definition of the 'give-and-take' negotiation technique is "Negotiating by compromising and making concessions in order to reach an agreement." This involves both parties in a negotiation being willing to make concessions and find a balanced solution that is acceptable to all involved.
